author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it is done. 🚀

author: Walt Disney
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. 🌟

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world. 🌍

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving. 🚴

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. ⏳

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. 💪

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. ✨

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: The time is always right to do what is right. 🕒

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. 🐢

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right. 🤔

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there. 🌠

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: Winners never quit, and quitters never win. 🏆

author: Helen Keller
quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence. 🌞

author: John Wooden
quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out. 🌻

author: Tony Robbins
quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment. 🌌

author: Babe Ruth
quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run. ⚾

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you’ve imagined. 🌈

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us. 🌿

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude. ✈️

author: Lao Tzu
quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step. 🥾

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Don’t wish it were easier, wish you were better. 🌠

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams. 🌠

author: Mark Twain
quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So, throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. 🌊

author: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take. 🏒

author: Maya Angelou
quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude. 🌼

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions. 😊

author: Les Brown
quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars. 🌌

author: Anaïs Nin
quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage. 🌻

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love. 💖

author: Norman Vincent Peale
quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world. 🌏

author: Harriet Tubman
quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. 🌅

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself. 🦁

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way. 🏗️

author: Sun Tzu
quote: Opportunities multiply as they are seized. 🔗

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. 🌺

author: Bruce Lee
quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one. 🐉

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Well done is better than well said. 💬

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: I never lose. I either win or learn. 📘

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities. 🧙‍♂️

author: Sheryl Sandberg
quote: What would you do if you weren't afraid? 🤔

author: Michael Jordan
quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed. 🏀

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: Don't count the days; make the days count. 🕰️

author: Elon Musk
quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor. 🚀

author: Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less. 🔬

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: One child, one teacher, one book, and one pen can change the world. 📚

author: Thomas Edison
quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work. 💡

author: Aristotle
quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit. 🏆

author: Helen Keller
quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow. 🌞

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems; it's the ability to deal with them. 🌈

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. 👟

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'! 🌻

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears. ✨

author: Confucius
quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones. 🏔️

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: Not all those who wander are lost. 🧭

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
quote: The best thing one can do when it’s raining is to let it rain. 🌧️

author: Rumi
quote: What you seek is seeking you. 💫

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. 🧘‍♂️

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change. 🔄

author: Stephen Covey
quote: Live out of your imagination, not your history. 🌌

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world. 🛠️

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone else's cloud. 🌈

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals. 🌟

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail. 🛤️

author: Les Brown
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. 🌠

author: Jack Canfield
quote: Don't worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don't even try. 🎯

author: Napoleon Hill
quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve. 🧠

author: George Eliot
quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been. ⏳

author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn. 🌊

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. 🧠

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself. 🔄

author: Booker T. Washington
quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome. 🏔️

author: Kahlil Gibran
quote: Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life. 🌞

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it. 🌌

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities. 🧙‍♂️

author: Yoda
quote: Do, or do not. There is no try. 🟩

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: After climbing a great hill, one only finds that there are many more hills to climb. ⛰️

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you. 🏃

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength. 🧘‍♂️

author: Buddha
quote: What we think, we become. 💭

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others. 🙏

author: Robert Frost
quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on. 🕰️

author: Dolly Parton
quote: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain. 🌧️🌈

author: Brené Brown
quote: Vulnerability is not winning or losing; it's having the courage to show up and be seen when we have no control over the outcome. 🦋

author: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make. 🌿

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment. 🌟

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. 🌌

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay. ⏳

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all. 🌸

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. 💖

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have. 🛠️

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever. 📚

author: Rumi
quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself. 🌻
